skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roots f. m.
des:
The Album Collection You Wish You Still Had.

The Roots is an Internet radio station at www.theroots.fm. Free Form Classic Rock means we play thousands of classic deep tracks vs. the 500 songs most Classic Rock stations repeat over and over again. Our DJ’s programmed radio stations in St. Louis and Los Angeles when all of this music was brand new. They really know their music and have interviewed most of the artists, so they have lots of insights you won’t hear on other stations.

The Roots is listener supported with no commercials.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
